page.title: 03Homes in the Haywoods
page.content: There are 763 private houses in Little Haywood and Colwich, and a further 290 in the part of Great Haywood covered by the block. In addition there are 6 in Little Haywood which have a business incorporated. Of the 763 in Lt. Haywood 563 are detached, 106 are semidetached, and 74 are terraced. There are also 4 farmhouses and 16 flats. 134 are bungalows (including Dormers), the remainder being two storey or more. In Great Haywood only 51 of the 290 are detached. There are also 165 semidetatched, 50 terraced and 24 flats. 92 are bungalows but many of these now have loft conversions, and all the remaining 198 are two storey homes.
